thread.title: Henryk P Feszczur
thread.title_full: TheShowerSealShop.com reviewed by Henryk P Feszczur

author: Henryk P Feszczur
title: Henryk P Feszczur
text: I had a small order. It came through as requested in the agreed time. Packaging was solid enough to ensure the item arrived undamaged. I did find the website a little confusing to find the right item (Shower seal) as there are many profiles and not clear to me how they are sequenced. But once I found the item (and other similar web sites did not stock this item), the rest was very smooth.
